body:
Comment 9: 
It sounds like we know what's wrong and we know how to fix it: use LockOSThread during
func init so that func main will be locked to the main thread, and then you can do what
you like from within func main. 

That's clunky but it's the best API that I know how to create. An API that says "well
maybe we won't run your code at all, but if we do it will be on this particular thread"
is not terribly useful.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
